comment: ABYSMAL. The app is slow, it often won't upload at all, refuses to save downloads to boards, and when it does, it's apt to save the pictures to the WRONG boards!! 馃が
key sentence: Attempting to upload content to the app, but it being slow or not uploading at all.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
